Name: The Fiend's Tavern
About the game: The Fiend's Taven, is a tavern management game, in which you need to try and have the best tavern in the kingdom. Achieve this by serving customers, and giving quests to adventurers, upgrading your tavern, and of course, getting robbed. Beat your score on a localized leaderboard, learn how to better your reputation and not fail.
